title: Frequency of internet use in Spain 2017
summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Duration, and Share of individuals in each Duration on the y axis.
The maximum Share of individuals 80.0 is found at Duration Once a week (including every day) and the minimum is found at Less than once a week where Duration is 5.0.
The difference of Share of individuals between the highest and lowest Duration is 75.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of individuals for 4 number of Durations.
The Share of individuals is appeared to be the highest at Duration Once a week (including every day) and lowest at Duration Less than once a week.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Duration, and Share of individuals in each Duration on the y axis.
The maximum Share of individuals 80.0 is found at Duration Once a week (including every day) and the minimum is found at Less than once a week where Duration is 5.0.
The difference of Share of individuals between the highest and lowest Duration is 75.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of individuals for 4 number of Durations.
Duration Once a week (including every day) has the highest Share of individuals and Less than once a week has the lowest Share of individuals.
The highest Duration Once a week (including every day) has 75.0 more Share of individuals than the lowest Duration Less than once a week.
Share of individuals at Duration Once a week (including every day) is 80.0 , second place is Daily at 69.0, and thirdly is At least once a week (but not every day) at 11.0.
The lowest value 5.0 at Less than once a week is almost 1.94 times smaller than the average value 41.25.
Summing up the values of all Durations, we get total 165.0.

data.Duration: At least once a week (but not every day)
